I've finally had chance to play and finish the famous Portal 2, they improved the game so much if we compare it to the previous one.  All the visuals and sound design was better. They clearly added a lot more levels in single player, it was quite long to finish. Also I want to say that level design is very clever and creative. They also added new mechanics to the game which made it more unique in my opinion. The fact that they added multiplayer mode and allowed community to create their own maps is also a plus. As for the story, it wasn't that amazing for me to be honest, but the other aspects of the game were very well done.
